Romance.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
Romance.description: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge is a 1995 Indian romance film directed by Aditya Chopra.

Romance.title: Bangalore Days
Romance.description: Bangalore Days is a Malayalam-language romantic drama directed by Anjali Menon. It follows the lives of three cousins who move to Bangalore and explores their relationships and aspirations.

Romance.title: Arjun Reddy
Romance.description: Arjun Reddy is a Telugu-language romantic drama directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. It tells the story of a brilliant but self-destructive surgeon and his tumultuous relationship with his girlfriend.
